overview: You live in one of the most expensive cities in the world, you're broke and rent is due. So what's a handsome, well built bro with a huge cock, hungry hole and no money supposed to do? You need to get out there and start Making Rent! At first glance these jobs seem pretty much like a no-brainer. Cleaning houses, working as a grip on set at the Nob Hill Theatre, or being a bar back at the Powerhouse seems like an honest way to make a living. But when the opportunity comes to make even more money in exchange for sucking dick and fucking ass, who is going to say no? Not these guys! They will do whatever it takes when it comes to Making Rent.
title: Making Rent
